title: Further improve CreateManifestResourceName memory allocations
body:
This is a general issue to acknowledge that there is further work that can be done to optimize `CreateManifestResourceName`. It is its own issue because there's relevant conversation about it.

See the conversation at: 
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/5538#issuecomment-663914339

Relevant issue: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/5513

nodes.body: Labeling with size:1 as the cost of the initial investigation. Will open a follow-up issue if more work is identified.
